content: to last 5 sts ssk k2tog k1 round 32 knit round 33 ssk k2tog repeat to end round 34 knit round 35 k2tog repeat to end round 36 k0 1 0 1 0 1 k2tog repeat to end halfwind hat 5 finishing cut yarn leaving an 8-inch tail thread tapestry needle and pass needle through remaining sts twice pull tight and pass needle through center of crown weave in ends where you can find me instagram @trish_knits etsy www etsy com/shop/warfelknits ravelry www ravelry com/people/twar4 email warfelknits@gmail com © 2025 by tricia e warfel all rights reserved this free pattern is for personal use only halfwind hat 6 charts chart instructions the chart starts at the bottom and is read from right to left for every round the 12-stitch pattern is repeated to the end of each round work the hat body then continue to the crown decreases on the next page hat body baby work rounds 1-20 one time 20 rounds total toddler work rounds 1-24 one time then work rounds 1-4 one more time 28 rounds total child work rounds 1-24 one time then work rounds 1-8 one more time 32 rounds total adult m work rounds 1-24 one time then work rounds 1-16 one more time 40 rounds total adult l work rounds 1-24 one time then work rounds 1-20 one more time 44 rounds total adult xl work rounds 1-24 two times 48 rounds total 24 chart key 23 22 knit fj_`ig hi ^je 21 20 \ ssk 19 18 fj_`ig hi ^je 17 / k2tog 16 15 fj_`ig 4-st lc 14 fj_`ig hi ^je 13 12 hi ^je 4-st rc 11 10 hi ^je fj_`ig 9 8 7 6 hi ^je fj_`ig 5 4 3 2 hi ^je fj_`ig 1 halfwind hat 7 crown decreases *switch to dpns when stitches no longer fit on circular needle sizes toddler child remove sm knit 6 sts replace sm new bor all sizes work rounds 25-35 round 36 k0 1 0 1 0 1 k2tog repeat to end / 35 chart key 34 / \ 33 knit 32 / \ 31 \ ssk 30 / \ 29 28 / k2tog \ / 27 26 \ / 25 finishing cut yarn leaving an 8-inch tail thread tapestry needle and pass needle through remaining sts twice pull tight and pass needle through center of crown weave in ends halfwind hat 8
